document.full_text: the head of the international atomic energy agency said thursday that a target destroyed by israeli warplanes in 2007 was a covertly built nuclear reactor, countering assertions by syria.
document.title: middle east: syria: u.n. atomic watchdog director says bombed syrian site was reactor
lines_and_colors: the head of the international atomic energy agency said thursday that a target destroyed by israeli warplanes in 2007 was a covertly built nuclear reactor, countering assertions by syria.
